careerBackground: My career started with setting up and running a multi-channel ecommerce company for 4 years. Then moving to Fidelity Investments for 3 years where I performed a number of roles including test manager, business analyst, strategic owner for Fidelity's in-house pricing system. I then made the move to Ipreo where I was a lead business analyst for the fixed income new issue software which all capital market banks use globally. My experience covers both Agile & Waterfall software delivery lifecyles (SDLC).
superHeroPower: My superhero power would be able to time travel back through time and take a glimpse at the history of our world!
